Player History
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 4/3/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $2,128,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 4/4/1985, off Jack Morris (NYY)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/12/1985, off Bruce Hurst (BOS)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/22/1985, hitting .471 with 4 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Injured on 10/24/1985 with a Broken Foot, out for 5 weeks...
Won World Series with Toronto in 1985...
Won Gold Glove Award at Second Base in 1985...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Toronto in 1987...
Won Gold Glove Award at Second Base in 1987...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/12/1988, hitting .545 with 0 HR, 5 RBI...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
9/1/1988: Signed a contract extension with Toronto, $9,120,000 per year, for 3 years.
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Detroit on 6/22/1989...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
